name: ATemplateSequenceActor
doc: Actor responsible for controlling a specific template sequence in the world.

BindingOverride: The override for the template sequence's root object binding. See SetBinding.

methods.name: GetSequence
methods.doc:
Get the template sequence being played by this actor.

@return the template sequence, or nullptr if it is not assigned or cannot be loaded

methods.name: GetSequencePlayer
methods.doc: Get the actor's sequence player, or nullptr if it not yet initialized.

methods.name: LoadSequence
methods.doc:
Get the template sequence being played by this actor.

@return the template sequence, or nullptr if it is not assigned or cannot be loaded

methods.name: SetBinding
methods.doc:
Set the actor to play the template sequence onto, by setting up an override for the template
sequence's root object binding.

methods.name: SetSequence
methods.doc: Set the template sequence being played by this actor.
